ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Phobia clings to the cieling outside the comm room thinking of how insane Magmatron sounds. taking on a Maximal warship with such limited forces is suicide.

Phobia clings to the cieling outside the comm room thinking of how 
insane Magmatron sounds.
"taking on a Maximal warship with such limited forces is suicide."
Transforms to robot mode sticks head inside door

"Excuse me, I don't mean to disturb you but I was wondering about 
taking my ship up for a test flight?" I'm sure you can do without me 
for a few hours."

 --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Dachande85@a... wrote:
> ::Magmatron::
> 
>     "Can you pick up my signal?" Magmatron called to the Maximal 
ship. He had 
> his comm set to monitor all frequencies, Maximal and Predacon 
alike. He 
> happened to be sitting in the Comm room when the message was sent. 
He hoped 
> they could find him, they might be useful to make an alliance 
with. "If you 
> can land as close as you can, the Predacons are in number down 
here, and we 
> could use some help."
